description:
At last, the protagonist Donny Bogan fulfills his revenge after he saw through the plot of Lieri and Naomi, the greatest female officers in the solar system!!! The proud female warriors, who have fallen into the prison of space, meet hell`s end through the humiliation of orgasm training......! Don`t pass by the moment their personalities are destroyed from complete brainwashing! The sows in action post-breakdown is also a must-see!
Source: Official website`s episode four page, translated by lf412
